channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How the Supreme Court May Untangle the Tariff Knot
item.description: Don’t expect a broad constitutional ruling or a complete answer in the tariff case.

item.title: Inflation rose 2.7% on an annual basis in December report that shows stabilizing prices
item.description: Prices rose 2.7% for the year ending in December, the federal government said Tuesday, matching the previous month's report and Wall Street's expectat...

item.title: If Fraud In Minnesota Looks Bad, Wait Till You See Gavin Newsom’s California
item.description: Newsom’s budget gimmicks ignore the core issue: expanding programs without safeguards, then begging for bailouts when the math implodes.

item.title: Democrats Who Let Covid-Era Child Tax Credits Expire Now Cry ‘Crisis’ Over Lapsing Obamacare Giveaway
item.description: Why is it only a 'crisis' when a spending program expires on Republicans’ watch?

item.title: Lawmakers urge NIH to stop taxpayer money for 'dangerous' bat virus lab in U.S.
item.description: Republican lawmakers have asked the Trump administration to cancel its support for a controversial new lab being built in Colorado to research coronav...

item.title: Banning Wall Street From Buying Houses Is Great, But Trump Needs To Do More
item.description: The move to ban institutional investors from buying single-family homes is a step in the right direction, but it won’t fix the major housing affordabi...

item.title: How To Stop School ‘Mindfulness’ Apps From Harvesting Your Child’s Health Data
item.description: Schools' mindfulness meditation programs come with a hidden cost — the collection of children’s data, which could potentially be misused.

item.title: Minnesota has released more than 400 'criminal' migrants in 1 year: DHS
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security challenged Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz to start cooperating with ICE to turn over illegal immigrants with criminal rec...

item.title: Why Sex Differences Matter in Women’s Sports
item.description: In ruling on whether males should be able to compete alongside girls and women, the Supreme Court should trust science.

item.title: Are American College Students Brilliantly Disabled?
item.description: More students are reporting disabilities — and getting A’s.

item.title: Targeting Powell
item.description: If this is a baseless effort at revenge or pure intimidation, it’s a disgrace.

item.title: U.S. can't give Venezuelan deportees due process, Rubio tells Judge Boasberg
item.description: The Trump administration says it is not feasible to carry out a judge's order to set up new methods for migrants already deported back to Venezuela to...

item.title: Will Washington Learn the Lessons of Tiananmen in Tehran?
item.description: If he chooses to stand by while Iran burns, Donald Trump runs the risk of repeating his predecessors’ mistakes.

item.title: Elon Musk’s Custody Fight Underscores Problems Of Situationships
item.description: The situation of Elon Musk's children is a tragic example of why weakening marriage and detaching it from sex hurts children most, but also hurts all ...

item.title: Trump tells Minnesotans that 'day of reckoning & retribution' is coming
item.description: President Trump cryptically warned Minnesota residents on Tuesday that "the day of reckoning & retribution is coming."
